name: 謝東儒
objective: 本課程是研究所程度的計算機圖學，介紹三維計算機繪圖原理、OpenGL、WebGL、 Shading Language 著色語言、繪圖管線、計算幾何、射線追蹤、體積成像繪圖，課程範圍包含計算機圖學最新的研究主題如物理模擬、射線投射、巨觀且聚焦技術、即時體積成像繪圖等等。
schedule:
1 -  Syllabus, From Vertices to Fragments
2 -  Graphics Systems and Models
3 -  Graphics Programming
4 -  Input and Interaction
5 -  Geometric Objects and Transformation
6 -  Viewing and Projections
7 -  Lighting and Shading
8 -  Discrete Techniques, Texture Mapping
scorePolicy: Programming assignments, paper presentation, programming projects, class participation
materials: Edward Angel, Interactive Computer Graphics: A Top-Down Approach with WebGL, 7th Edition, Pearson, 7 edition, 2014.
